title: Every seen a good silver?
body:
Hey boiz and girlz

I am looking for a ranked team that will play competitively that I could try out.

I am very good at league better then faker. jks silver scrub.

But in all seriousness I would like to join a team.
IGN : CC Authentic
Age : 15
Race : Korean (Gotta be good at league)
Main Roles : Mid and ADC
Champ Pool : Syndra Orianna Fizz Zed and Leblanc
S4 / S3 SoloQ rank : S3 - B2 S4 - S2 Current - S4
However, I am better then my rank in my opinion. :)
